episodes.title: Ep52: Escaping the Cult: Peter Young's Journey to Freedom | Michael & Peter
episodes.description: Join Peter Young as he shares his harrowing experience of being trapped in a small religious cult for nearly two decades. In his book "Stop the Tall Man, Save The Tiger," Peter delves into the lessons learned from his ordeal and how he was able to break free from the grip of brainwashing and control. Through faith, family, and friends, Peter emerged from the cult stronger than ever, determined to raise awareness and help others recognize the signs of cult manipulation. Tune in to hear Peter's cautionary tale and learn how to spot potential cult leaders and support loved ones trapped in similar situations.   👉 Follow Peter Young 👉 Instagram @peterbyoung 👉 Facebook @Peteryoung32 👉 YouTube @authorpeteryoung 👉 Website: https://www.authorpeteryoung.com/ 👉 Books: https://a.co/d/9YYAFVW   If you want to learn more about how to overcome adversity, check out my book at the following: 👉Amazon: https://amzn.to/3JWbG2X  👉Audible Audio Book: https://adbl.co/40O6zsc  👉Barnes & Noble: http://bit.ly/40pCAHx  __________________________________ ❂Please, like, and share this video ❂Press the bell 🔔 for more updates. ❂Share your opinion in the comments.  🔶 Subscribe now!
